title: Wasureji no Kotonoha (忘れじの言の葉)
lyrics: Ko tono ha o tsumui de mado ronda utaka ta ta bibi to ma yoiko mu oto gi no fu kai ki ri sa shino beta tenohi ra sot to fure ru yoka n u keto mete afure ta hika ri no hi toshizu ku    o moka ge u suro t te hoho enda maboro shi o moi no ha teru ba sho mada haruka tokut e moto me sagashite samayotte yagate utaware te iku sen iku man iku oku no senritsu to na ru itsu ka ushinai ubawarete k ieru sad ame de wo sore wa wasure ra eru kotona ki monogata ri    yu bisa ki o karame te fure ru dare ka no yu me ki sama reta omoi no koda ma dake ga hibi ku ko tono ha o tsumuid e mado ronda utaka ta ta bibi to no namae wo oto gibana shi to i u moto me sagashite samayotte yagate michi to naru iku sen iku man iku oku no eiyu wa iku itsu ka ushinai ubawarete k ieru sada me demo sore wa wasure ra reru koto na ku koko ni a ru moto me sagashite samayotte yagate uta wa rete iku sen iku man iku oku no senritsu to na ru itsu ka ushinai ubawarete k ieru sada me demo sore wa wasure ra reru koton aki monogata ri
